DOC.detailed_description: Preterm birth remain principal cause early neonatal death . Infants born preterm ( 37 week ' gestation ) often suffer significant immediate morbidity need lengthy stay neonatal intensive care unit . Moreover , significant risk long-term neurological morbidity proportion survivor . Patients multiple gestation significant risk preterm labor delivery approximately 60 % pregnancy deliver preterm . A number oxytocin receptor antagonist develop , , three , atosiban , barusiban retosiban investigate human tocolytic agent . To date , atosiban use outside clinical trial . Atosiban oxytocin receptor antagonist specifically develop treatment preterm labor . Early report use Atosiban tocolysis show promise vitro animal study , preliminary study pregnant non-pregnant human suggest low incidence maternal side effect .
